participant_1.background:
I am driven and tenacious, and I will not stop until I achieve my goals.
My weight is not relevant to this question.
i have two chiuahuahs.
i currently hold three jobs.
i am going to school for writing.

participant_2.background:
I would brag about skiing down mountains despite my fear of heights.
I'm proud of my ability to enjoy my free time.
I spend my days reading about politics and economics, and trying to understand how the world works.
i am active on my city council.
i have an internship at a computer company.

content.text: Pretty good.  I'm doing some research on politics.  What are you up to?
I'm trying to write a story.  I'm having trouble coming up with a good plot.
Have you tried talking to your friends or family about it?  Sometimes they can give you good ideas.
I've tried, but they just don't seem to get it.  They think the idea is stupid.
I'm sorry to hear that.  What is your story about?
It's about a group of friends who go on a road trip.  They get into all sorts of trouble along the way.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I'm sure you'll come up with a great plot.
Thanks.  I hope so.  I'm really excited about it.
I'm sure you'll do great.  What kind of writing do you usually do?
I usually write short stories.  I've never tried writing a novel before.
I think you should give it a try.  You might be surprised at how much you enjoy it.
I might.  Thanks for the encouragement.
You're welcome.  I'm always happy to help a fellow writer.
